metadata.dcterms:title: Mule deer and white-tail deer hybrid data
metadata.dcterms:creator: Russell, Ty
metadata.dcterms:description: Genetic analysis of mule deer and white-tail deer in Alberta at 40 species discriminating SNP (single nucleotide polymorphism) loci. Included in this dataset is the genotype file and associated R script demonstrating analyses for the simulation aspect of the study. Empirical results can be reproduced using the genotypes and adapting the R code as needed.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Earth and Environmental Sciences
white-tail deer
mule deer
hybridization
chronic wasting disease
metadata.dcterms:isReferencedBy: Russell et al. Evaluating introgressive hybridization of mule and white-tailed deer in Western Canada. Evolutionary Applications (in review)
